QuickCommand.command.initiateRemoveAll_f: Are you sure you want to remove all commands? execute /quickCommand removeAll confirm to confirm
QuickCommand.command.initiateRemoveAll_a: Please execute /quickCommand removeAll confirm to proceed with removing all commands
QuickCommand.command.confirmRemoveAll_wa: Execute /quickCommand removeAll first to initiate the removal process
QuickCommand.command.addHelpText: §7/quickCommand add <name> <command> §bAdd a quick command named <name> with command <command>
QuickCommand.command.exampleAddHelpText: §7Example: /quickCommand add "execute /seed command" "/seed" §bAdd a quick command to execute /seed
QuickCommand.command.exampleRemoveHelpTe: §7Example: /quickCommand remove "execute /seed command" §bRemove the quick command named "execute /seed command"
QuickCommand.command.removeAllConfirmHel: §7/quickCommand removeAll confirm §bConfirm to remove all quick commands
QuickCommand.command.swapHelpText: §7/quickCommand swap <index1> <index2> §bSwap the display positions of <index1> and <index2> in the list
QuickCommand.command.displayCommandInLis: §7/quickCommand displayCommandInList <true/false> §bWhether to display commands in the list

QuickCommand.command.server_exampleRemov: §7Example: /serverQuickCommand remove "execute /seed command" §bRemove the quick command named "execute /seed command"
